languages.text: "Всякая нить кончается смертью". {n}Висирь замолкает, словно эти слова все объясняют, затем кивает в пустоту.{/n} "Вижу, я вижу, {mf|он|она} еще пол{mf|он|на} вопросов. Давайте ответим е{mf|му|й}, братья и сестры, о нашей стезе".

"Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our ways, my brothers and sisters."
languages.original_text: "Всякая нить кончается смертью". {n}Висирь замолкает, словно эти слова все объясняют, затем кивает в пустоту.{/n} "Вижу, я вижу, {mf|он|она} еще пол{mf|он|на} вопросов. Давайте ответим е{mf|му|й}, братья и сестры, о нашей стезе".

traits.locale_text: "Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our way, my brothers and sisters."

"Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our way, my brothers and sisters."

"Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our ways, my brothers and sisters."

"Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our ways, my brothers and sisters."

languages.text: "Jeder Faden endet im Tod." {n}Der Wesir verstummt, als hätten diese Worte alles erklärt. Dann nickt er in den leeren Raum.{/n} "Ja, wie ich sehe, ist {mf|er|sie} noch immer voller Fragen. Geben wir {mf|ihm|ihr} Antworten zu unseren Bräuchen, meine Brüder und Schwestern."
languages.original_text: "Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our ways, my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Faden endet im Tod." {n}Der Wesir verstummt, als hätten diese Worte alles erklärt. Dann nickt er in den leeren Raum.{/n} "Ja, wie ich sehe, ist {mf|er|sie} noch immer voller Fragen. Geben wir {mf|ihm|ihr} Antworten zu unseren Bräuchen, meine Brüder und Schwestern."

languages.text: «Todos los hilos terminan en muerte». {n}El Visir guarda silencio, como si lo hubiera explicado todo con esas palabras. Después, asiente a la nada.{/n} «Sí, veo que sigue llen{mf|o|a} de preguntas. Démosle respuestas sobre nuestras tradiciones, hermanos y hermanas».
languages.original_text: "Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our ways, my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los hilos terminan en muerte». {n}El Visir guarda silencio, como si lo hubiera explicado todo con esas palabras. Después, asiente a la nada.{/n} «Sí, veo que sigue llen{mf|o|a} de preguntas. Démosle respuestas sobre nuestro camino, hermanos y hermanas».

languages.text: 「すべての糸は死で終わる」{n}ヴィジールは黙り込む。まるでその言葉がすべてを物語ったかのように。そして、何もない空間に向かってうなずく。{/n}「ああ、{mf|彼|彼女}はまだ聞きたいことだらけのようだ。我らの道についての答えを与えようじゃないか、我が兄弟姉妹よ」
languages.original_text: "Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our ways, my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての糸は死で終わる」{n}ヴィジールは黙り込む。まるでその言葉がすべてを説明したかのように。そして、何もない空間に向かってうなずく。{/n}「ああ、{mf|彼|彼女}にはまだ聞きたいことだらけのようだ。我らの道についての答えを与えようじゃないか、我が兄弟姉妹よ」

languages.text: “每根丝线都以死亡告终。”{n}宿老沉默下来，仿佛这句话已经解释了一切。随后，他朝空荡荡的地方点了点头。{/n}“是的，我看得出来，{mf|他|她}的心里依然充满了疑问。兄弟们，姐妹们，我们一起来回答教义的问题吧。”
languages.original_text: "Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our ways, my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: “每根丝线都以死亡告终。”{n}宿老沉默下来，仿佛这句话已经解释了一切。随后，他朝空荡荡的地方点了点头。{/n}“是的，我看得出来，{mf|他|她}的心里依然充满了疑问。兄弟们，姐妹们，我们一起来回答阿希尼之道的问题吧。”

languages.text: « Chaque fil se termine par la mort. » {n}Le vizir se tait, comme si cette seule phrase suffisait à tout expliquer, puis il acquiesce en direction du vide.{/n} « Oui, je vois bien qu'{mf|il|elle} se pose encore de nombreuses questions. Tâchons de l'éclairer quant à nos us, mes frères et sœurs. »
languages.original_text: "Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our ways, my brothers and sisters."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque fil se termine par la mort. » {n}Le vizir se tait, comme si cette seule phrase suffisait à tout expliquer, puis il acquiesce en direction du vide.{/n} « Oui, je vois bien qu'{mf|il|elle} se pose encore de nombreuses questions. Tâchons de l'éclairer quant à notre voie, mes frères et sœurs. »

languages.text: "Tüm iplikler ölümle sonlanır." {n}Vezir, ettiği sözler her şeyi açıklamış misali sükûnete bürünüyor. Ardından boş alana doğru başını eğiyor.{/n} "Evet, hâlâ soracak çok sorusu olduğunun farkındayım. Kardeşlerim, yöntemlerimize dair sorularına yanıt verelim."
languages.original_text: "Every thread ends in death." {n}The Vizsier falls silent, as though those words have explained everything. Then he nods toward empty space.{/n} "Yes, I see {mf|he|she} is still full of questions. Let us give {mf|him|her} answers about our ways, my brothers and sisters."
